name: ATrivialGame
0:
”Alexa, open a trivial game”
”Alexa, start a trivial game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a trivial game
des:
Alexa will ask you quiz questions about a variety of topics and offer you three answer choices. Pick your answer and compete with your friends for the highest score. Questions are general trivia and mild to moderate in difficulty.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
